overview: An extragavant father-oligarch who is looking for a worthy genetic material for the extension of his generation throws an unusal contest where the winner gets 2 million dollars and has to produce a grandson or granddaughter to rich parents.  However the way to granted fortune is anything but simple, so Kairat, an Almaty student-freshman who won the contest, will have to get over his shyness and also conquer the heart of the girl who has changed sexual orientation during studying abroad.
title: Kairat the champion. The virgin №1
